While I was there he received word that the Board of Regents of the University app~
roved his doing a series of shows from Texas Southern University which is the Negro
university in that area. His one difficulty is that he has been unable to obtain
funds from any major foundations largely because many of them regard KUHT as semÂ£~
fascist. This, of course, is not so and they are doing their utmost to counteract

As I said, I thik you, Walter and I should discuss this matter further*
Sincerely,
